title: Tel Aviv Elects New Rabbi
body: Tel Aviv sets election date for Chief Rabbi, 8 years after Rav Yisrael Meir Lau's tenure ended. The election will take place on January 6, 2026.

title: Goldknopf Opposes Draft Law
body: Israeli MK Yitzchok Goldknopf, of Agudas Yisroel, is poised to vote against the new draft law, citing quotas and sanctions. The legislation aims to stabilize PM Binyamin Netanyahu's coalition, but deep divisions are emerging among chareidi factions.

title: Camp Achim Fee Reduction
body: Camp Achim announces a shorter 2026 season due to Rosh Chodesh Elul falling on August 13, resulting in a two and a half day reduction in the camp's traditional duration.
